android_clumsy_keys: --filter "udp and (udp.DstPort == 1235 or udp.SrcPort == 1235)" --lag on --lag-inbound on --lag-outbound on --lag-time 10
--filter "udp and (udp.DstPort == 1235 or udp.SrcPort == 1235)" --drop on --drop-inbound on --drop-outbound on --drop-chance 3
--filter "udp and (udp.DstPort == 1235 or udp.SrcPort == 1235)" --throttle on --throttle-inbound on --throttle-outbound on --throttle-chance 3
--filter "udp and (udp.DstPort == 1235 or udp.SrcPort == 1235)" --duplicate on --duplicate-inbound on --duplicate-outbound on --duplicate-chance 3
--filter "udp and (udp.DstPort == 1235 or udp.SrcPort == 1235)" --ood on --ood-inbound on --ood-outbound on --ood-chance 3
